name: Disc OS
description:
This is what happens when computer science goes wrong .... and computer science always goes wrong.

Created for Disc Room Game Jam in 48hrs.

Controls

  • Click and drag yellow terminals to launch discs.
  • Escape through doors to progress.

Credits

  • Music by Destinny & Time
  • SFX by DOSEONE
  • Low poly hazard suit from the Unity Asset Store
